column1: *1914 - Allen and Unwins offices are opened in London by Stanley Unwin.
* 1941 - Voice actor Martin Jarvis is born.
* 1953 â€“ J.R.R. Tolkien is angry over the fact that an editor at Allen and Unwin has corrected dwarves to dwarfs

* 2003 - The Lord of the Rings and Philosophy is published.
* 2005 - http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Minya - 1st International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in wikipedia:Stockholm
